mapper.insert: insert into grade_field (id, field_name, menu_type, is_parent, parent_id, is_valid, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isParent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update grade_field set field_name = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_parent = #{isParent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, field_name, menu_type, is_parent, parent_id, is_valid, create_time, update_time from grade_field
